channel.title: Gs specs help

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 50){
setAnimation(2890);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(70);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(655);
}

This should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

It should be something like

getHit((50 + misc.random(50)));

Read full topic

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

I’ll try that, thanks in advance if it works.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 12:06:33 am[/size][hr]Well i updated the code and this is what it looks like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 150){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHitmisc.random(50); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }
Heres the error i get.

Read full topic

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

Hm, isn’t random a function, not a property? It probably looks more like this:
misc.random(maxnumber) or misc.random(minnumber, maxnumber).

Read full topic

item.title: Gs specs help
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Well im trying to increase the max hit of the ags special on my server, and the probability that it will hit the max hit.

heres the code for the special in client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(70); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

someone help please?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 150){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(50)+misc.random; specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }
^^^^^thats what i get when i add misc.random, i always get errors when i get misc.random

Read full topic
